text: @JoeNBC Then why a travel ban on in January? Why the task force formation? Why did Coronavirus make it into the State of the Union speech Feb. 4? Yeah, the speech @SpeakerPelosi tore up on live national television. Give me a break Joe. You’re a hack for CHINA!!!!!!!!!!
